about_the_game:
Embark on an exciting journey with Color by Number - Monster Heroes, a captivating game that combines creativity and puzzle-solving. Get ready to unleash your artistic skills as you bring to life a colorful world of courageous monster heroes.

In this delightful game, you'll encounter a variety of captivating monster hero characters, each waiting to be filled with vibrant colors. Using the numbered color palette, you'll carefully select and apply the corresponding colors to the pixelated sections of the artwork. Watch in awe as the monsters come to life with each stroke of color.

With a wide range of monster heroes to choose from, you'll never run out of exciting coloring opportunities. Whether it's a brave dragon knight, a mischievous goblin, a mystical werewolf, or any other fascinating creature, you'll find endless possibilities to explore and express your creativity.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter increasingly intricate and detailed monster hero illustrations. These challenging artworks will put your color-matching skills to the test and provide a satisfying sense of accomplishment as you complete each one.

Color by Number - Monster Heroes offers a relaxing and immersive experience, allowing you to unwind while engaging your mind and unleashing your inner artist. The intuitive controls and user-friendly interface make it suitable for players of all ages, from children to adults.

Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant colors and mesmerizing monster heroes. Let your imagination run wild as you create unique masterpieces, one pixel at a time. Color by Number - Monster Heroes is the perfect game for art enthusiasts, puzzle lovers, and anyone seeking a fun and creative escape.

Unleash your artistic talents, discover the beauty of color, and join the ranks of the Monster Heroes. Dive into the world of pixel art and immerse yourself in the magical journey that awaits you. Get ready to bring these courageous creatures to life with Color by Number - Monster Heroes.

Features:

• Lots of amazing artwork
• Easy coloring: Enjoy the intuitive design and smooth performance of the coloring book
• Long press to color continuously which makes coloring and drawing more easily.
• Easily color any image you want!

Coloring has never been easier! Just relax and color by Color by Number - Monster Heroes!

Learn how to play:

- Zoom the picture till boxes with numbers appear
- Choose colors in the palette and color boxes with matching numbers
- Use the long tap feature to color neighboring cells faster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Color by Number - Monster Heroes is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Color by Number has never been this easy!
